description: This file defines API routes for authentication, including user registration and login, using FastAPI. It handles incoming requests, depends on database session management, and utilizes service functions to process user data and generate JWT tokens.

methods.name: TokenResponse register(payload: RegisterRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to register a new user, creates the user via service function, and returns a JWT token response.

methods.name: TokenResponse login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests for user login, authenticates via service function, and returns a JWT token response.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(payload: RegisterRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/
